Title: Single Man
Writer: Jie Hao, Qitian Hao, Cuilan Yang
Actors: Yushan Cao, Lin Chen, Xiulan Chen, Pu Du
Plot: In Gu Jia Gou Village, 150 km from Beijing, men outnumber women. Some buy wives from faraway Sichuan province. Other remain bachelors; they gossip and complain together - yet find ways to ...
